mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.service_name AS "serviceName", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.menu_position AS "menuPosition", a.menu_style AS "menuStyle", a.create_by AS "careateBy", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.select: SELECT distinct ser.id, ser.service_name FROM org_role r, persion_info p, staff_vs_role sr, org_staff s, org_self_service_list ser, org_role_vs_service rs WHERE p.id = s.persion_id AND s.id = sr.staff_id AND sr.role_id = r.id AND p.id = #{0} AND s.org_id = #{1} AND rs.service_id = ser.id AND rs.role_id = r.id ORDER BY ser.service_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_self_service_list( id, service_name, org_id, menu_position, menu_style, create_by, remarks, update_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{serviceName}, #{orgId}, #{menuPosition}, #{menuStyle}, #{createBy}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE org_self_service_list SET service_name = #{serviceName}, org_id = #{orgId}, menu_position = #{menuPosition}, menu_style = #{menuStyle}, create_by = #{createBy}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, create_date = #{createDate} WHERE id = #{id}
